member.name: M:Solnet.Serum.ISerumClient.GetMarketsAsync
member.summary: Gets the available markets in the Serum DEX. This is an asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task which may return a list with the market's info.

member.summary: Gets the available markets in the Serum DEX.
member.returns: A list with the market's info.

member.name: M:Solnet.Serum.ISerumClient.GetTokensAsync
member.summary: Gets the available tokens in the Serum DEX. This is an asynchronous operation.
member.returns: A task which may return a list with the token's info.

member.summary: Gets the available tokens in the Serum DEX.
member.returns: A list with the token's info.

member.name: M:Solnet.Serum.ISerumClient.GetMarketAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the account data associated with the given market address in the Serum DEX. This is an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The public key of the market account.
member.returns: A task which may return the market's account data.

member.summary: Gets the account data associated with the given market address in the Serum DEX.
